Policy.acknowledgement_statement: CTLA4 Study #1 has been funded in whole or in part with federal funds from the National Cancer Institute, National Institutes of Health under Contract No. HHSN261200800001E, National Institutes of Health under contract number 5R01HL113304-01, the National Health and Medical Research Council of Australia, Cancer Council NSW, and Grant Number AI071087, AI095848 and AI061093 from NIH-NIAID. The datasets used for the analyses described in this manuscript were obtained from dbGaP at http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/projects/gap/XXXXX through dbGaP study accession numbers xxxxx. Data from the CTLA4 Study #1 Project were provided by Gulbu Uzel and Julie Niemela on behalf of their collaborators at the National Institutes of Health and the National Health and Medical Research Council of Australia, Cancer Council. Gulbu Uzel and her collaborators request that publications resulting from these data cite their original publication (to follow, after submission).

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Autoimmune Diseases, IRB, PUB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-ADO-IRB-PUB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Autoimmune Diseases. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. Requestor agrees to make results of studies using the data available to the larger scientific community.
